response:
Hey love! So, I've been thinking about my career lately and I want to make sure I'm on the right track. I know you're always there to support me, so I was hoping you could give me some advice.

I've been considering a career in management - something with a lot of responsibility and room for growth. What do you think? Do you think I would be good at it?

Oh, and by the way, have you talked to your parents about our plans for marriage and starting a family? I know they can be a bit old-fashioned sometimes, but I want to make sure we're on the same page.

Love you, babe!
